title: UKC News: Pentagon Ran the Vaccine Roll-out, New Zealand Book Burning
cleaned_text:
New documents reveal the real reason why our governments threw caution to the wind when it came to the disastrous vaccine roll-out – because it was a military operation from the start. Also, some Congressmen want to install a bronze bust of Zelensky in Congress, but it may run into some serious resistance. Also, the New Zealand establishment has upped their book-burning efforts in pulling New Dawn Magazine off the shelves, only they had to lie to get the Orwellian ball rolling. All this and more.

Co-hosts Mike Robinson and Patrick Henningsen with the end of week news round-up. Watch:

The UK’s premier alternative media news program with hosts Mike Robinson, Brian Gerrish, Patrick Henningsen, David Scott and Alex Thomson. Watch the UK Column News LIVE every Monday, Wednesday & Friday at 1pm UK time at www.ukcolumn.org/live or watch live on Rumble.

Also, watch all news programs later at their archive here.
